pullRequest.title: HBASE-24086 Disable output stream capability enforcement when running in standalone mode

nodes.bodyText: nit: make it an else if? meaning if the user didn't override UNSAFE_STREAM_CAPABILITY_ENFORCE and its a local fs mode..
Just test whether this is a LocalFileSystem is enough?
